As for the downsides... they're extremely thin and clingy, so though they are plenty opaque, make sure you're wearing appropriate underwear because the outline will be visible. The pattern, probably not, but the shape will be. The polyester fabric also means that they don't breathe as well as cotton or other natural fiber materials, meaning they can get very warm in the summer or if you're a warm sleeper. I also find that the drawstrings are pretty short, and I've had to rescue them from being swallowed by the casing a couple times, but the elastic is robust enough that the pants stay up fine without it. Overall, great warm-ish pants for inside or out, if you have lowish standards for what pants you wear in public like I do.
